room_title: Escape room "What Lies Beneath " by Escape109 in Charlotte
room_description: There is a lot of history to the Lake Norman area, a lot of mysterious history. Local fisherman William Lee has been around this area to see it grow from a farm town on a river to a booming lake destination in just a few decades. Legend has it that in that time he has managed to gather quite the collection from the bottom of the lake, and that he will do anything to protect it. Now that you have found his old fishing cabin maybe you can see just what that old recluse has found over all those years. Just be sure to get out before he returns!
